abstract: The owner of Russneft, one of Russia’s largest private oil companies, confirmed that he would sell the business to an investor loyal to the Kremlin.
snippet: The owner of Russneft, one of Russia’s largest private oil companies, confirmed that he would sell the business to an investor loyal to the Kremlin.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, July 30 — The owner of Russneft, one of Russia’s largest private oil companies, confirmed Monday that he would sell the business to an investor loyal to the Kremlin, but he added in an open letter that the sale was not voluntary.

headline.main: Russian Oil Magnate Forced to Sell to Putin Loyalist, He Says
headline.print_headline: Russian Oil Magnate Forced to Sell to Putin Loyalist, He Says
